DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety , efficacy tolerability brexpiprazole ( placebo ) monotherapy combination therapy ( Zoloft ) adult PTSD .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Flexible Dose Brexpiprazole Monotherapy Combination Therapy Treatment Adults With Post-traumatic Stress Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This trial design assess efficacy , safety tolerability flexible dose brexpiprazole monotherapy combination therapy Zoloft ( Sertraline ) adult subject PTSD . This study consist continuous 12-week , double-blind treatment period 14-day follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Male Female subject year 1865 diagnosis PTSD ( diagnosis make screen ) Index trauma event > 15 year screen Index trauma event age < 16 Any traumatic event within 3 month screen
